```{r, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>"
)
```

```{r setup}
library(rbenvo)
data("FFR_distances")
data("FFR_subjects")
```

```{r}
bdf <- benvo(subject_data = FFR_subjects,
             bef_data = list(FFR_distances),
             bef_names = "FFR",
             joining_id = "id",
             distance_col = "Distance",
             exposed_time_col = c(NULL))
bdf
```
